subject: PROS
title: Classic Prosthodontic Lit Rvw
info: Selected historical literature. Current research, its implications for present-day restorative dental therapy.

subject: PROS
title: Current Literature Review
info: Historical development of maxillofacial prosthetics, interdisciplinary relationships in treatment of maxillofacial patient.

subject: PROS
title: PROS Treatment Planning
info: Practical clinical experience in examination, diagnosis, treatment planning, various phases of treatment of patients with complex restorative dental problems. New/unfamiliar concepts/techniques.

subject: PROS
title: TMD Disorders
info: Prosthodontic treatment of patients having complex restorative needs with possible systemic complications. Patient therapy is coordinated in hospital environment and in graduate clinic of dental school.

subject: PROS
title: AppliBiomat
info: Principles governing manipulation of materials used in restorative dental practice. The physical and mechanical properties and the biocompatibility of dental materials to oral tissues.

subject: PROS
title: PrinMaxCare
info: Treatment, biomechanics, and technical procedures associated with fabrication, fitting, and servicing of various types of oral and facial prostheses.

subject: PROS
title: Adv Clinical Prosthodontics 1
info: Practical clinical experience in examination, diagnosis, treatment planning, and various phases of treatment of patients with complex restorative dental problems. New and unfamiliar concepts and techniques.

subject: PROS
title: Adv. Tech. Restorative Dent.
info: Residents are exposed to technical aspects of complete denture, removable partial denture, fixed partial denture construction, associated use of implants, considerations related to temporomandibular dysfunction (TMD).
prereqInfo: prereq: instr consent; offered concurrently with course on dental materials, head/neck anatomy

subject: PROS
title: AdRestDentII
info: Continues review of selected historical literature with discussion of current research and its implications for present-day restorative dental therapy.

subject: PROS
title: AdRestDentIII
info: Continues review of selected historical literature with discussion of current research and its implications for present-day restorative dental therapy.

subject: PROS
title: AdRestDentIV
info: Continues review of selected historical literature with discussion of current research and its implications for present-day restorative dental therapy.

subject: PROS
title: GradOcclu
info: Seminar and clinical experience involving concepts and philosophies of jaw function. Application of kinematics in the development of a dental occlusion.
